pr_title: add Terraform configs generated from initial state of deployment.hcl

timeline.message:
add Terraform configs generated from initial state of deployment.hcl

The configs only cover steps 1 and 2, and does not represent a complete
deployment.

timeline.bodyText: what is the create the deletion lien and add to shared VPC referring to?
timeline.author: zohrehj
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,147 @@
+# Copyright 2020 Google LLC
+#
+# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
+# you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
+# You may obtain a copy of the License at
+#
+#      http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+#
+# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
+# distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
+# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
+# See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+# limitations under the License.
+
+terraform {
+  required_version = "~> 0.12.0"
+  required_providers {
+    google      = "~> 3.0"
+    google-beta = "~> 3.0"
+  }
+  backend "gcs" {
+    bucket = "example-dev-terraform-state"
+    prefix = "audit"
+  }
+}
+
+# Create the project and optionally enable APIs, create the deletion lien and add to shared VPC.

replies.bodyText:
The comment is generic from template. The deletion lien is controled by the lien attr below, which is https://cloud.google.com/resource-manager/docs/project-liens#:~:text=You%20can%20place%20a%20lien,can%20use%20Google%20Cloud%20Shell.
For shared VPC, that is not applicable here. Audit project is not attached to the shared VPC hosted in the network project. The apps project and data projects are. See below for an example.
replies.author: xingao267

timeline.bodyText: @zohrehj  This is an example of adding the project to the shared VPC. The shared VPC is the centralized network created and hosted in the networks project. I'll add some more doc to the template.
timeline.author: xingao267
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,217 @@
+# Copyright 2020 Google LLC
+#
+# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
+# you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
+# You may obtain a copy of the License at
+#
+#      http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+#
+# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
+# distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
+# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
+# See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+# limitations under the License.
+
+terraform {
+  required_version = "~> 0.12.0"
+  required_providers {
+    google      = "~> 3.0"
+    google-beta = "~> 3.0"
+  }
+  backend "gcs" {
+    bucket = "example-dev-terraform-state"
+    prefix = "example-dev-apps"
+  }
+}
+
+# Reserve a static external IP for the Ingress.
+resource "google_compute_global_address" "ingress_static_ip" {
+  name         = "my-studies-ingress-ip"
+  description  = "Reserved static external IP for the GKE cluster Ingress and DNS configurations."
+  address_type = "EXTERNAL" # This is the default, but be explicit because it's important.
+  project      = module.project.project_id
+}
+
+# ***NOTE***: First follow
+# https://cloud.google.com/cloud-build/docs/automating-builds/create-github-app-triggers#installing_the_cloud_build_app
+# to install the Cloud Build app and connect your GitHub repository to your Cloud project.
+#
+# The following content should be initially commented out if the above manual step is not completed.
+
+# resource "google_cloudbuild_trigger" "server_build_triggers" {
+#   for_each = toset([
+#     "WCP",
+#     "WCP-WS",
+#     "auth-server-ws",
+#     "user-registration-server-ws",
+#     "response-server-ws",
+#   ])
+#
+#   provider = google-beta
+#   project  = module.project.project_id
+#   name     = each.key
+#
+#   included_files = ["${each.key}/**"]
+#
+#   github {
+#     owner = "GoogleCloudPlatform"
+#     name  = "example"
+#     push { branch = "^master$" }
+#   }
+#
+#   filename = "${each.key}/cloudbuild.yaml"
+# }
+
+# Create the project and optionally enable APIs, create the deletion lien and add to shared VPC.
+module "project" {
+  source  = "terraform-google-modules/project-factory/google"
+  version = "~> 8.1.0"
+
+  name                    = "example-dev-apps"
+  org_id                  = ""
+  folder_id               = "0000000000"
+  billing_account         = "XXXXXX-XXXXXX-XXXXXX"
+  lien                    = true
+  default_service_account = "keep"
+  skip_gcloud_download    = true
+  shared_vpc              = "example-dev-networks"
